name: One Heart (Pete Vellucci Jr)
description:
A very short, simple game I jammed out in 48 hours leading up to and through Valentine's Day. A friend asked for ideas on how best to celebrate what she calls "Singles Awareness Day" and I suggested jamming out a game, and then I took my own advice.

I hope you enjoy the game and appreciate the message.

Tip if you're finding the game too difficult: the area becomes less crowded the more you fail, which is hard to notice at first.
